scripts.build: webpack & npm run sass & npm run move & wait; npm run start
scripts.sass: sass --style=compressed --sourcemap=none --no-cache  src/scss/main.scss build/assets/main.css && sass --style=compressed --sourcemap=none --no-cache  src/scss/app.scss build/assets/app.css && cleancss -o build/assets/main.css build/assets/main.css && cleancss -o build/assets/app.css build/assets/app.css
scripts.move: for f in src/*; do if [ $f != src/components ]&&[ $f != src/redux ]&&[ $f != src/scss ]&&[ $f != src/index.jsx ]; then cp -rf $f build/; fi done; cp -rf config/ build/config/; cp -rf vendor/ build/assets; cp -f package.json build/
